name: DayCounter
0:
”Alexa, ask Day Counter how long until 10th December”
”Alexa, ask Day Counter how many sleeps until Santa”
”Alexa, ask Day Counter how many weeks since 1st January 2001”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: day counter
des:
The skill counts the exact number of days, weeks, months, or years between today and any date in the past or future. Just ask "how long until 15-Nov" or "how many weeks since 1-Jan-2002".
It can also check "how many sleeps until Santa" and add an exciting note if it's only a few days away.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
